metadata.title: CVE-2021-47289 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ACPI:fix NULL pointer dereference Commit 71f642833284 ("ACPI: utils: Fixreference counting in for_each_acpi_dev_match()") started doing"acpi_dev_put()" on a pointer that was possibly NULL. That fails miserably,because that helper inline function is not set up to handle that case. Justmake acpi_dev_put() silently accept a NULL pointer, rather than callingdown to put_device() with an invalid offset off that NULL pointer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
